data.name: WCount.App.Description
data.value: Count the number of lines, words, characters, and/or bytes in one or more specified files.

data.name: WCount.App.Words.Description
data.value: Count the number of words in one or more specified files.

data.name: WCount.App.Chars.Description
data.value: Count the number of characters in one or more specified files.

data.name: WCount.App.Bytes.Description
data.value: Count the number of bytes in one or more specified files.

data.name: WCount.App.Lines.Description
data.value: Count the number of lines in one or more specified files.

data.name: Exceptions.NoFileProvided
data.value: No file was provided as an argument to be used.

data.name: Exceptions.FileNotFound
data.value: The program was unable to find the specified file. If the file exists, consider checking your input for typos or mistakes.

data.name: Exceptions.BugReport.Request
data.value: If this was unintended or unexpected, it would really help us out if you could file a Bug Report.

data.name: Exceptions.BugReport.FileIssue
data.value: You can file a Bug Report at https://github.com/alastairlundy/WCount
